sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> and a couple <radical>fire</radical>s run into each other. They cancel each other out completely, and the remainder left behind is a <kanji>faint</kanji> remnant of what was once there.
meaningInfo: You go to see if you can find any remainder of the fire + tsunami battle. You can, but it's so faint.
readingMnemonic: Just like the tsunami and fire canceling each other out, leaving a <kanji>faint</kanji> remainder of what was, your <reading>tan</reading> (<ja>たん</ja>) is extremely faint as well.
readingInfo: Look at your skin. It has such a faint tint.
